name: Star Chaserz
description:
Game made for Train Jam 2019!

Thanks to Elie Abraham for music!

This was a technical project for me where I tried implementing split screen in pico8.

It turned out to be a sneaky joust-like game for two players.

You each control one pixel each. Using the background to melt in and surprise your opponent. Hitting the walls will give away your position.

Player1 controllers:

Arrows and M

Player 2 controllers:

ESDF and A
